So let's set the scene shall we.

Bruce walks into the bar Mike and his entourage are currently being obnoxious in. Mike sees Bruce walk in and starts making Asian jokes. (This is the 80s and Mike is drunk in my scenario. So yeah, he would make Asian jokes)

After a few minutes Bruce finally loses his patience and approaches Mike. Mike laughs and puts his drink down waiting for the little man's response. Bruce calmly asks Mike if he’d like to step outside. Mike shrugs off his $40,000 leather jacket and walks out the back door swearing the whole way.

Once they get outside Bruce does a few light stretches silently while Mike stares at him standing completely still. A sort of film has rolled over Mike's eyes. It's like he's looking at Bruce from a thousand miles away. He isn't talking. He isn't moving.

As the fight commences Bruce circles Mike a few times, trying to gauge what the massive boxer will do. He knows his hands will be the problem so he stays well out of range.

After a few seconds of dancing Tyson seems to get bored and begins lumbering directly towards Bruce. Bruce throws a snapping high kick that lands flush across Tyson's cheek. As Bruce dances back out of range, he notices that Tyson never broke eye contact. As Mike continues to lumber forward undeterred, Lee charges in with three straight punches intended to slow the advance of Mike. He lands all three cleanly and bounces back out of range. A small trickle of blood flows from Mike’s lip. The smile is gone.

Mike flows forward in a rush of movement, completely utilizing his peek-a-boo style. Within half a second he's cleared ten feet of space and is well within striking range of Lee. Lee circles backwards while throwing a beautiful two straight, high kick combo. Everything lands on Mike’s guard except the kick, which Mike allows through just as he's throwing his lead hook. The kick grazes off of Mike’s cheek just as he puts his full body weight into his lead hook. It lands on Bruce's orbital bone with the force of a small automobile accident. The entirety of the right side of Lee's face collapses.

Mike snorts a line of coke, makes some more terrible Asian jokes and goes home to watch porn.

replies.msg:
Author Matthew Polly even mentions the Lee-LeBell incident in his well-researched 2018 biography of Lee, Bruce Lee: A Life, where he claimed Lee was being too rough in fight scenes with the stuntmen on the set of the Green Hornet and LeBell, as gently as he could, straightened him out.

Gene was initially reluctant to say anything negative about Lee. He has always said that he considered Lee a friend and Lee’s inclusion of some of LeBell’s grappling moves in his films and his book The Tao of Jeet Kune Do would seem to bear that out. But LeBell did eventually put me in touch with karateka Bob Wall, who co-starred with Lee in Enter the Dragon and knew both Lee and LeBell very well.

Wall told me the two men got into some good-natured back and forth on the set of the Green Hornet TV show where Lee co-starred as Kato and LeBell was working as a stunt man, just as Once Upon a Time in Hollywood depicts. Eventually they decided to do some friendly sparring at which point LeBell grabbed Lee and picked him up pressing him overhead. Wall said Lee was angered by this and threatened to do LeBell real harm when he put him down, to which he said LeBell responded, “Then I guess I’ll have to keep you up there a while.”

When I asked him what he did when Lee threatened to hurt him, I seem to recall Gene’s response was “What do you think? I body slammed his scrawny ass. He was a hundred thirty pounds soaking wet. What could he do to me?”

睇嚟好多人誤解咗李小龍點解會係一個「傳奇」
第一個原因，係因為佢早死，呢個係成為「傳奇」嘅最大原因
因為早死，大家對佢會有好多幻想
覺得佢唔係早死，一定可以改變世界更多
我哋嚟幻想一下：

如果肥媽一早死咗，我哋而家會點諗佢？
會覺得佢係民主鬥士 ，會用音波功對抗水砲車
哥哥梅姐而家都畀連登吹捧到未死一定係反共
https://lihkg.com/thread/2157816/page/1

但早死之外，另一個成為傳奇因素係佢嘅頁獻同佢嘅付出
李小龍嘅武術哲學我唔多講了，付出係指佢對武術嘅執著
呢啲可以youtube睇返識佢嘅人話佢以前為咗練武嘅付出
好多CCTVB我唔貼link了

最後就係時勢同識唔識投胎
等如美斯喺而家嘅香港出世只會係一個毒撚
李小龍屋企唔係窮，有好多哲學家屋企都唔係窮
唔窮先可以諗咁多嘢同實行

好多人早死，好多人付出好多，但都未必可以有人賞識
以上嘅嘢加加埋埋萬中無一先可以做到「傳奇」
但成為傳奇嘅壞處就係好多人對佢有無限幻想過份吹奏
（同高登吹奏謝安琪一樣）
幻想佢係世界最強，打遍天下無敵手
洪金寶李家鼎呢啲都講過李小龍點勁點勁
但李家鼎都講過李小龍比過一個茄喱啡掃腳跌低
同埋佢喺美國畀人襲擊

李小龍打交勁，但講到同重量級拳王相比，有無得打？
如果講動物界，高加索犬係犬隻類接近頂峰
但高加索犬打唔打得贏獅子？
生物打鬥體格就係一切，高加索犬就算打得贏藏獒Pit Bull
但對住獅子真係得啖笑, 但根本一開始就無相比嘅必要
係一班盲目吹捧嘅人吹奏高加索犬秒殺獅子

那須川天心喺自己領域係最強

mayweather 1.73 公尺，68 公斤
看似唔係差好遠
那須川天心唔勁咩？勁到痴線
但結果那須川天心成為世界一大笑話（實有人話佢無得用腳啫）
本來唔同領域根本唔應該相比
只係有一班人幻想鬥犬打得贏獅子

結論係唔同領域根本唔應該相比

第一個原因，係因為佢早死，呢個係成為「傳奇」嘅最大原因
因為早死，大家對佢會有好多幻想
覺得佢唔係早死，一定可以改變世界更多
我哋嚟幻想一下：

如果肥媽一早死咗，我哋而家會點諗佢？
會覺得佢係民主鬥士 ，會用音波功對抗水砲車
哥哥梅姐而家都畀連登吹捧到未死一定係反共
https://lihkg.com/thread/2157816/page/1

李小龍屋企唔係窮，有好多哲學家屋企都唔係窮
